SEARCH
Package uk.ac.ucl.comp0010.controller

Class GradeController

java.lang.Object
uk.ac.ucl.comp0010.controller.GradeController
@RestController @RequestMapping public class GradeController extends Object
A controller that manages grade objects and provides endpoints for handling grade-related operations.

  • Constructor Details

    • GradeController

      public GradeController(StudentRepository studentRepository, GradeRepository gradeRepository, ModuleRepository moduleRepository, RegistrationRepository registrationRepository)
      Constructs a GradeController with the specified repositories.
      Parameters:
      studentRepository - the repository used to manage student data
      gradeRepository - the repository used to manage grade data
      moduleRepository - the repository used to manage module data

  • Method Details

    • addGrade

      @PostMapping("/grades/addGrade") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Grade> addGrade(@RequestBody Map<String,String> params) throws NoRegistrationException
      Handles the creation of a new grade for a student.
      Parameters:
      params - a map containing the following keys:
      • student_id: the ID of the student
      • module_code: the code of the module
      • score: the score to assign
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity containing the saved Grade object
      Throws:
      NoRegistrationException - if no registration for the student or module is found

    • getAllGrades

      @GetMapping("/grades") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Map<String,Object>> getAllGrades()
      Retrieves a list of all grades.
      Returns:
      A list of all grades.

    • getModuleByGradeId

      @GetMapping("/grades/{id}/modules") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Map<String,Object>> getModuleByGradeId(@PathVariable Long id)
      Retrieves the module associated with the specified grade ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the grade whose associated module is to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity containing a map with the module's details, including its code and name.
      Throws:
      NoSuchElementException - if no grade with the specified ID is found.

    • getStudentByGradeId

      @GetMapping("/grades/{id}/students") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Map<String,Object>> getStudentByGradeId(@PathVariable Long id)
      Retrieves the student associated with the specified grade ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the grade whose associated student is to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity containing a map with the student's details, including their ID, first name, and last name.
      Throws:
      NoSuchElementException - if no grade with the specified ID exists.

    • getGradeById

      @GetMapping("/grades/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Grade> getGradeById(@PathVariable Long id)
      Retrieves a grade by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the grade to retrieve
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity containing the grade if found, or an appropriate error response if not found

    • updateGrade

      @PutMapping("/grades/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Grade> updateGrade(@PathVariable Long id, @RequestBody Map<String,String> params) throws NoRegistrationException
      Updates the grade with the specified ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the grade to update
      params - a map containing the parameters for the update: - "student_id": the ID of the student - "module_code": the code of the module - "score": the new score for the grade
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity containing the updated Grade object, or a 404 Not Found status if the grade is not found
      Throws:
      NoRegistrationException - if there is an issue with the registration

    • deleteGrade

      @DeleteMapping("/grades/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Void> deleteGrade(@PathVariable Long id)
      Deletes the grade with the specified ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the grade to be deleted
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity with no content if the deletion is successful
      Throws:
      NoSuchElementException - if the grade with the specified ID is not found

    • updateGradeScore

      @PatchMapping("/grades/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Grade> updateGradeScore(@PathVariable Long id, @RequestBody Integer score)
      Updates the score of a grade with the specified ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the grade to be updated
      score - the new score to be set for the grade
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity containing the updated Grade object
      Throws:
      NoSuchElementException - if the grade with the specified ID is not found

    • getModulePropertyByGradeId

      @GetMapping("/grades/{id}/module/{proprtyId}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> getModulePropertyByGradeId(@PathVariable Long id, @PathVariable String proprtyId) throws NoSuchElementException
      Retrieves a specific property of a module associated with a grade by grade ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the grade
      proprtyId - the property of the module to retrieve (e.g., "code" or "name" or "mnc")
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity containing the requested module property as a string, or a BAD_REQUEST status if the property is invalid
      Throws:
      NoSuchElementException - if no grade with the specified ID is found

    • getStudentPropertyByGradeId

      @GetMapping("/grades/{id}/student/{proprtyId}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> getStudentPropertyByGradeId(@PathVariable Long id, @PathVariable String proprtyId) throws NoSuchElementException
      Retrieves a specific property of a student associated with a grade by grade ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the grade
      proprtyId - the property of the student to retrieve (e.g., "name" or "email" or "first" or "last" or "username" or "id")
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity containing the requested student property as a string, or a BAD_REQUEST status if the property is invalid
      Throws:
      NoSuchElementException - if no grade with the specified ID is found
